verbs.description: [ARG0: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee Chairman Trey Gowdy ( R - S.C. )] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARG1: that the Justice Department 's Inspector General ( IG ) report on the handling of the Hillary Clinton email probe helps President Trump] .

House Oversight and Government Reform Committee Chairman Trey Gowdy ( R - S.C. ) said on Sunday that [ARG0: the Justice Department 's Inspector General ( IG ) report on the handling of the Hillary Clinton email probe] [V: helps] [ARG1: President Trump] .
